EIM Group (Egyptian International Motors), nke e guzobere n'afọ 1979 bụ otu n'ime nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ ndị nwe onwe ha n'Ijipt. EIM bụ isi azụmaahịa na ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ ala nke ụlọ ọrụ nne ya Alkan Group

EIM Group na-arụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ngalaba, nke gụnyere ịrụ ọrụ na nkesa nke ụgbọala, yana imepụta ngwaọrụ na-agagharị n'ala, ụgbọ ala ndị njem na ụgbọ mmiri na ngwá ọrụ ike. Eim Group nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ Mokattam, Cairo ma na-arụkọ ọrụ na Renault Egypt.
Kemgbe 2006, Egypt International Trading & Agencies Co
guzobe onwe ha dị ka onye na-ekesa Kia Motors na Egypt, nke ghọrọ onye enyemaka nke EIM Group..

Mohammed Mahoud Nosseir (onye isi oche) guzobere Alkan Group n'afọ 1974. Otu ahụ nwere ụlọ ọrụ nwanne nwanyị iri na atọ, nke sitere na ngwọta IT na ndị na-ejikọta usoro na ego, ndụmọdụ itinye ego na ịgbanye yarn nke ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe..
